hints.content: Let's use place value blocks to help us solve!

The number has $\purpleD8$ hundreds, $\blueE{10}$ tens, and $\maroonD{0}$ ones.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/6f6d1faf9b59a3e6df44ca468512eb6b61fd2eb5)

$\blueE{10}\text{ tens} = \purpleD1\text{ hundred}$ so we can move the $\blueE{10}\text{ tens}$ to the hundreds column.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/541f81e80990e9bc5ea9294206cd0d58b1743252)

Now, there are a total of $9$ hundreds.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/296566a79eb271d30b556b924dc890b4b5035c77)

$9$ hundreds = $900$

question.content:
**What number represents the same amount as $8$ hundreds $~+~10$ tens $+~0$ ones?**

[[☃ input-number 1]]
